body: This could be made slightly faster. Currently it will zero fill `indices` only to overwrite it a moment later. We could use `reserve` and `push_back` consecutive integers
body_html: This could be made slightly faster. Currently it will zero fill indices only to overwrite it a moment later. We could use reserve and push_back consecutive integers
